== Film location ==
In the 1990s, filming for the television show, Nowhere Man, took place in Forest Grove numerous times.
In 2015, an episode of The Librarians was filmed at Pacific University and two other sites in Forest Grove.  The city's historic Forest Theater hosted a free public screening of the episode at the same time it aired on TV .
